Ikaf -- Female Saxa Human Heroic Iron Guild Mercenary
Attributes (8 Points):
Agility: d4 Smarts: d6 Spirit: d6 Strength: d8 Vigor: d12
Attribute Notes:
Brawny: +1 Strength Step (encumbrance and minimum strength requirements)
Soldier: +1 Strength Step (encumbrance)/May reroll Vigor (environmental hazards)
Brave: +2 Spirit vs. fear, -2 fear table roll
Courageous: +2 vs. fear and -2 on fear table rolls
Death Before Dishonor: +2 Spirit (mass battle morale)
Disciple Of Hothar: +2 vs. mind effects
Disciple Of Kenaz: +2 Vigor (resist heat)
Disciple Of Thunor: +1 Vigor (resist hot and cold)/Suffers half normal falling damage
Giant Blood: May spend a Benny to gain +2 Strength step for 6 rd
Liquid Courage: Drinking alcohol gives +1 Vigor Step and -1 Smarts, Agility and associated skills for 1 hr
Reliquary (Reliqus): Successful Agility-2 avoids trap effects
Strong Willed: +2 Smarts (resist Tests)/+2 Spirit (resist Tests)
Warm Blooded: +2 Vigor (cold weather effects)
Skills (28 Points):
Armor-Rune: (sma) d4 Cut-Rune: (sma) d4 Repair: (sma) d4+2
Arrow-Rune: (sma) d4 Dispel-Rune: (sma) d4 Research: (sma) d6+2
Athletics: (agi) d6+2 Earth-Rune: (sma) d4 Science: (sma) d4+2
Battle-Rune: (sma) d4 Elemental-Rune: (sma) d4 Secret-Rune: (sma) d4
Beast-Rune: (sma) d4 Fighting: (agi) d8 Shield-Rune: (sma) d4
Blessing-Rune: (sma) d4 Focus: (spi) d6 Spellcasting: (sma) d4
Calming-Rune: (sma) d4 Glow-Rune: (sma) d4 Stealth: (agi) d4
Change-Rune: (sma) d4 Healing-Rune: (sma) d4 Tongue-Rune: (sma) d4
Charm-Rune: (sma) d4 Healing: (sma) d6+6 Travel-Rune: (sma) d4
Coldfire-Rune: (sma) d4 Notice: (sma) d4+2 Weather-Rune: (sma) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d6+2 Performance: (spi) d4
Curse-Rune: (sma) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d6+1
Languages: Anari; Fey; Frosttongue; Selari; Tuomi

Alertness: +2 Notice

Arcane Background (Heahwisardry): -2 arcane skill, +1 per extra round taken (+3 max)
Arcane Background (Hrimwisardry): -2 Persuasion (civilized races)/Hrimwisardry is affected by temperature

Charismatic: May reroll Persuasion
Danger Sense: +2 Notice (surprise)/May attempt Notice-2 in circumstances not normally subject to Notice
Disciple Of Eira: 5 companions gain +2 natural Healing
Disciple Of Eostre Plantmother: +1 Faith (vegetated areas)
Disciple Of Ertha: +2 Survival (underground)
Disciple Of Hela: +1 Faith (graveyards)
Disciple Of Hoenir: May attempt untrained Knowledge rolls
Disciple Of Nauthiz: May reroll 1s on Gambling, Stealth, and Thievery; suffers fatigue for 1 dy if reroll is 1
Disciple Of Sigel: +2 Notice (detect hidden objects and creatures)
Disciple Of The Unknowable One: +1 vs. Taunt
Disciple Of Ullr: +2 Stealth (wilderness)/+2 Survival (wilderness)

Dungeon Crawler: +1 Athletics (underground)/+1 Stealthy (underground)/+1 Survival (underground)/-1 Size for squeezing into tight spaces
Fame: +2 Persuasion (influence friendly individuals)
Fast And Silent: Suffers no penalty for running Stealth
Feint: May force foe to oppose Fighting test with Smarts instead of Agility
Free Runner: +2 Athletics (climbing)/+2 on foot chases
Guild Thief: +2 Common Knowledge (home country)/Uses d8 Wild Die on choice of Athletics, Stealth (urban), or Thievery
Hearth Knight: +1 Parry and +2 called shots vs. cold-resistant and -immune creatures
Hedge Magic: May identify plants for herbal remedies
Horse Lord: Uses d8 Wild Die with Riding/Mount shares Parry and resistance
Humiliate: May reroll Taunt
Inspire: R14" May use Battle to Support all Extras on any Trait 1/rd
Investigator: +2 Notice (sifting for information)
Jack-Of-All-Trades: Successful Smarts roll gives d4 (Raise d6) on chosen skill
Killer Instinct: May reroll self-initiated opposed Test
Linguist: Knows 6 languages
Lorekeeper: May attempt untrained Knowledge skills at d4-2 and other untrained Smarts skills at d4
Master (Academics): Uses d10 for Academics Wild Die
Master Mariner: Ignores 2 penalty points on Boating
Mc Gyver: May use Repair to create an improvised weapon, explosive, or tool
Mentalist: +2 opposed Psionics
Mister Fix It: Raise on Repair cuts time required by half
Mounted Combatant: Ignores 2 penalty points on Riding/Successful Ride gives mount +2 Pace
Noble: +2 Persuasion (networking with aristocrats)/+2 Common Knowledge (etiquette, heraldry, gossip)
Pathfinder: Allies may move through scouted difficult terrain at 2/3 Pace
Provoke: Raise on Taunt inflicts -2 on foe attacks on other targets; joker Action Card ends
Rabble-Rouser: May Taunt or Intimidate all foes in a 2" radius
Ranger: Trackers suffer -2 Survival/Uses d8 Wild Die with choice of Stealth, Survival, or Survival
Reliable: May reroll Support
Reliquary (Arcanologist): +2 Common Knowledge (relics)/+2 Knowledge (relics)/May use Occult to learn unattuned relic powers
Reliquary (Reliqus): +2 Notice (traps)/+2 to disarm traps
Retort: Raise on resisting Intimidation or Taunt Test causes foe to be Distracted
Roadwarden: +2 Notice (wilderness ambushes, traps, and concealed weapons)
Salmon Leap: +1" jump
Sister Superior: Successful Healing-2 immediately after an allied Extra takes a Wound reduces it to Shaken
Speed Rider: Mount gains +2 Pace/May suffer mount fatigue to gain dbl running dice
Streetwise: +2 Intimidation (criminal network)/+2 Persuasion (criminal network)/+2 Common Knowledge (criminals)
Thief: +1 Athletics (urban climbing)/+1 Stealth (urban)
Woodsman: +2 Stealth (wilds)
Work The Room: Gains additional Performance or Persuasion die to Support 2/rd
World-Wise: May attempt unskilled Knowledge (area) rolls
Size: 2 Deity: Dargar
Advances: 12 Improvement Points: 30 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 6; Edge: 16; Skill: 8

Giant Blood: Has Mean feature
Great Luck: Increased Luck effects
Legendary Storyteller: Increased Master Storyteller effects
Beast Bond: May spend Bennies on companion animals
Beast Master: Has an animal companion; other animals will not attack first
Command: R14" Commanded gain +1 to recover from Shaken or Stunned
Common Bond: Communication allows transfer of Bennies to allies
Connections: May call in favors from an acquaintance or organization
Disciple Of Eostre Plantmother: May use Champion and Holy Warrior edges with plant creatures
Disciple Of Neorthe: May survive on half water and survives drowning for 12 rd
Disciple Of Niht: No penalty in dim and dark illumination, -2 in pitch dark
Disciple Of Rigr: Needs only 3 hrs sleep, suffers half penalty for missed sleep, and counts as an active guard when asleep
Disciple Of Sigel: Suffers half normal illumination penalty vs. heat-producing foes
Disciple Of Tiw: +1 Rank for acquiring combat edges
Disciple Of Vali: Immune to disease and poison
Disciple Of Var: May sell goods at 50% cost (Raise 75%)
Dragon Guard: Has Arcane Resistance, Favored Foe, and Giant Killer features with marsh dragons and marsh orms

Followers: Has 5 soldier followers

Knight Hrafn: Ignores rank requirement for leadership edges
Large Family: +2 Kinship results
Luck: +2 Benny each session
Master Storyteller: Story subjects use d8 (Raise +1d8 each) for glory rewards and suffer no penalty for critical failure
Mean: Ill-tempered and disagreeable
Natural Leader: May apply leadership edges to Wild Cards
Orders: Takes orders from an outside power
Powerful Family: +2 Kinship results
Rich: 5x starting funds
Sanctuary: Prepared location grants +2 Will, +2 vs. Fear, and +1 Healing after four days
Sea Fear: Fears the presence of large bodies of water
Sidekick: Has special bond with companion
Styrimathr: Owns a Smabyrding
Veteran Dragon Guard: Has Champion features and +2 vs. paralysis with marsh dragons and marsh orms
Weak Family: -2 Kinship results

Champion: +2 damage on foe w/supernaturally opposed alignment
Charge: May make a free melee attack after a run

Coordinated Firepower: R14" Simultaneous ranged attacks by commanded at a single target gain +2 attack per person
Counterattack: May make a free attack after a failed foe attack 3/rd

Dead Shot: Joker Action Card gives dbl damage from first successful ranged attack

Steady Hands: Suffers no penalty for a shot from an unstable platform and reduces running shot penalty by 1
Steal Away: Successful Stealth allows withdrawal without attack
Sunder: +2 AP with any weapon
Sweep: May make attack on all within reach
Tactician: R14" Successful Battle before combat gives 1 Action Card per success and Raise to distribute to commanded extras
Take Aim: Commanded gain +1 shooting and throwing damage (1d6+1 with Coordinated Firepower)
Tough As Nails: Takes 5 Wounds before becoming incapacitated
Two-Fisted: Suffers no multi-action penalty for making a melee attack with each hand
Vengeful Strike: May make a free melee attack when an adjacent ally becomes incapacitated
Wall Of Steel: Foes gain no Gang Up bonus
War Cry: May use Intimidation against all in a 3" radius
Watcher Of The Black Gate: +2 vs. demon powers
Weapon Master: +d10 damage on a melee attack Raise
Arcana
Power Count: 34 Power Points: 125
Powers:
Aim: (1 PP) RTouch Target gains +2 attack (Raise +4) w/thrown or missile weapon while maintained
Altered Senses: (1 PP) RTouch Target gains Infravision or Low Light Vision feature (Raise both) while maintained
Arcane Resistance: (1 PP) RTouch Foes suffer -2 (Raise -4) on arcane attacks and damage against target while maintained (+1 PP/additional target)
Armor: (2 PP) RTouch Target gains +2 Armor (Raise +4) while maintained (+1 PP/additional target)
Barrier: (2 PP) R6" Creates a 5" long by 1" high wall w/hardness 10 for 5 rd (+1 PP Barrier inflicts 2d4 damage; +1 PP Barrier has +2 hardness; +2 PP Shapes barrier; +1 PP Creates 10"x2" barrier)
Battle Song: (2 PP) R2" Creatures in range gain Berserk feature (Spirit neg) while maintained
Beast Friend: (1/Size PP) R6" Target can speak with and control beast actions for 10 min (+1 PP Target can use beast's senses)
Becalm: (3 PP) RSight Target ship suffers half speed while maintained
Bladebreaker: (2 PP) R6" Target weapon destroyed (Weapon die type neg)
Bless/Panic: (1 PP) R6" Allies in range gain +2 Spirit (or foes suffer -2) vs. fear (Raise +4/-4) while maintained
Bolt: (1 PP) R12" Target suffers 2d6 damage (Raise 3d6) (+2 PP Inflicts 3d6 damage (Raise 4d6))
Boost Trait: (2 PP) R6" Target gains +1 Trait step (Raise +2) for 5 rd
Boost/Lower Trait: (2 PP) R6" Target gains +1 Trait Step (Raise +2) for 5 rd or suffers -1 Trait Step (Raise -2) (Spirit recovers 1 Step (Raise all) each rd) (+1 PP/additional target; +1 PP Spirit-2)
Bridge: (1/Section PP) R6" Creates sections of 1" horizontal surface while maintained
Burrow: (2 PP) R6" Allows target to merge into earth and move half Pace (Raise full) for 5 rd (+1 PP/additional target; +1 PP Allows burrowing through stone)
Burst: (2 PP) R9" Cone inflicts 2d6 damage (Raise 3d6) (+2 PP Inflicts 3d6 damage (Raise 4d6))
Charismatic Aura: (1 PP) RSelf Target gains +1 Persuasion (Raise +2) while maintained
Confusion: (1 PP) R12" Target suffers -2 Trait rolls (Raise -4) (Smarts neg) while maintained (+2/+3 PP 2"/3" radius)
Deflection: (3 PP) R6" Foes suffer -2 attacks (Raise -4) on target for 5 rd (+1 PP/additional target)
Detect/Conceal: (2 PP) R12" Target can detect the presence of supernatural effects or conceals target aura while maintained (+1 PP/additional target; +1/+2 PP 2"/3" radius; +1 PP Detect-2)
Disease: (3 PP) R6" Target suffers disease and fatigue; may die (Vigor neg)
Dispel: (1 PP) R6" Ends targeted power (Casting suffers -2 if backgrounds differ; opposed arcane skill neg) (+1 PP Disrupts magic item for 1 rd (Raise 2 rd))
Elemental Form: (5 PP) RSelf Gains elemental form special abilities while maintained
Elemental Manipulation: (1 PP) R6" Self may perform minor elemental manipulation for 5 rd
Environmental Protection: (2 PP) R6" Target gains protection from hazards and -4 damage from like sources (Raise -6) for 1 hr (+1 PP/additional target)
Etherealness/Corporealness: (5 PP) R6" Target becomes unaffected by physical world or ethereal creature becomes affected (Spirit neg) while maintained
Fatigue: (3 PP) R12" 2" radius (Raise 3") inflicts fatigue (Vigor neg)
Fog Cloud: (3 PP) RSelf 4 mile fog reduces lighting 1 step (Raise 2 steps) while maintained
Fortune's Favored: (1 PP) RTouch Target may reroll failed Benny-purchased reroll while maintained
Gift Of Battle: (2 PP) RTouch Target gains choice of leadership edge (Raise 2 edges) while maintained
Gravespeak: (3 PP) RTouch Target may ask a spirit 6 questions
Growth/Shrink: (2/Size PP) R6" Target gains or loses Toughness and 1 Strength Step (Spirit neg) for 5 rd
Healing: (3 PP) RTouch Target recovers from 1 Wound (Raise 2) suffered in the past hr (+10 PP Restores older Wound; +20 PP Heals crippling injury; +1 PP Neutralizes poison or disease)
Heat Mask: (1 PP) RTouch Target remains invisible to infravision while maintained
Insight: (1 PP) RTouch Self sees 1 event that occurred recently to touched object
Invisibility: (5 PP) R6" Target becomes invisible; foes suffer -4 sight-based actions (Raise -6) for 5 rd (+3 PP/additional target)
Light: (2 PP) R6" Creates a 3" radius of bright light for 30 min (+1 PP Attaches to object or moves effect 4"/rd)
Luck/Jinx: (3 PP) RTouch Target takes the better/worse of two Trait rolls while maintained
Negate Arcana: (5 PP) R6" 2" radius dispels all magic while maintained
Puppet: (3 PP) R6" Target obeys self (Raise complete control; Spirit neg) for 5 rd (+2 PP/additional target)
Quake: (6 PP) R18" 3" radius inflicts 2d10 damage (Agility neg)
Quickness: (4 PP) RTouch Target gains an additional action (Raise also redraw Action Cards below 8) while maintained
Shape Change: (3+ PP) RSelf transforms into animal form (Raise +1 Strength and Vigor) for 5 rd (+1 PP Allows speech while changed)
Silence: (1 PP) RTouch Mutes 2" radius while maintained (+1 PP Moves effect 4"/rd; 1 PP/target (Spirit neg))
Sluggish Reflexes: (2 PP) R12" Target draws 1 fewer Action Card or takes the lower of 2 cards (Spirit neg) while maintained
Slumber: (2 PP) R12" Target sleeps for 1 hr (Spirit neg) (+2/+3 PP 2"/3" radius)
Smite: (2 PP) R6" Target weapon inflicts +2 damage (Raise +4) for 5 rd (+1 PP/additional target)
Speak Language: (1 PP) R6" Target speaks a specified language (Raise also slang and dialects) for 10 min (+1 PP/additional target)
Speed: (1 PP) RTouch Target gains dbl Pace (Raise also Run as a free action) while maintained (+1 PP/additional target; +2 PP Reduces target multi-action penalty by 2)
Storm: (5 PP) RSelf Creates or dissipates 10 mile lightning storm or blizzard while maintained
Succor: (1 PP) RTouch Target recovers from 1 level of fatigue (Raise 2 levels)
Summon Beast: (2+ PP) R30" Self controls summoned animal's actions while maintained
Summon Elemental: (4 PP) R12" Self controls summoned elemental's actions while maintained
Viper Weapon: (2 PP) R12" Transforms target weapon into a viper while maintained
Voice On The Wind: (2 PP) RSelf Transmits 30-word message up to 300 miles to known target
Warding: (5 PP) RSelf 2" radius (Raise 3" radius) bars specified creature type while maintained
Warrior's Gift: (4 PP) R6" Target gains combat edge effects (Raise improved version) for 5 rd (+1 PP/additional target)
Weapon Immunity: (3 PP) RTouch Target takes half damage (Raise no damage) from specified weapon type while maintained
Whirlwind: (2 PP) R6" 2" radius knocks prone (Strength neg) (+1 PP 3" radius; +1 PP Strength-2)
Wilderness Step: (1 PP) RTouch Target treats all terrain as normal while maintained

Arcana Notes:
Arcane Background (Druidism): 3 Powers/10 Power Points
Arcane Background (Elementalism): 3 Powers/10 Power Points
Arcane Background (Finnar Wind Priest): 3 Powers/10 Power Points
Arcane Background (Glamour): 3 Powers/10 Power Points
Arcane Background (Heahwisardry): 3 Powers/10 Power Points
Arcane Background (Hrimwisardry): 2 Powers/10 Power Points
Arcane Background (Miracles): 3 Powers/10 Power Points
Arcane Background (Psionics): 3 Powers/10 Power Points
Arcane Background (Rune Magic): 0 Powers/10 Power Points
Arcane Background (Solar Magic): 3 Powers/10 Power Points
Arcane Background (Song Magic): 3 Powers/10 Power Points
Arcane Background (Soul Binding): 3 Powers/10 Power Points
Elemental Mastery: Knows spells from 2 Elementalism disciplines, casts at -1
Improved Concentration: Increased Concentration effects
Improved Focus: Increased Focus effects
Improved Rapid Recharge: Increased Rapid Recharge effects
New Powers: +2 Power Count
New Rune: Knows spells from 2 runes
Power Points: +5 Power Points
Alchemy: May create arcane devices for known spells
Ancestral Guardian: May spend a Benny to cast Aim, Boost Trait, Deflection, Environmental Protection, Farsight, or Warrior's Gift on self
Artificer: May give items arcane powers
Augment Staff (Spell Store): Staff can store 1 known spell that may be cast at +2
Channeling: Raise on arcane skill roll reduces Power Point cost by 1
Combine Spells: May cast two spells simultaneously
Concentration: +4 to resist spell disruption
Delay Spell: May postpone spell effect 1 - 6 rd
Disciple Of Hela: Dbl Raise on Zombie creates permanent undead
Disciple Of Maera: May cast any off-list spell at -2/+2 casting on Dispel
Disciple Of Scaetha: +1 casting vs. undead
Disciple Of The Norns: May spend a Benny for an augury
Disciple Of Thrym: Casts more effectively in cold environments
Disciple Of Tiw: May cast and attack as a single action
Enhanced Maintenance: May maintain a spell while asleep
Extra Effort: May spend 1 or 3 Power Points to gain +1 or +2 Focus
Focus: May attempt an immediate Spirit roll to recover from Shaken due to spell failure or siphoning
Hellfreeze: Cold spells do normal damage to resistant, half to immune, dbl to vulnerable, and dbl+4 to targets with weakness
Holy/Unholy Warrior: R6" Evil/good target Shaken (Spirit vs. Faith neg (multiple targets Faith -2); critical failure destroys or wounds)
Instinctive Dispel: May attempt a free Dispel of a spell that effects self 1/rd
Potent Magic: Targets suffer -1 arcane resistance/Foe Dispel attempts suffer -2
Rapid Recharge: Recovers 20 Power Points/hr
Reflect Spell: Raise on Dispel allows turning a spell back on the caster
Righteous Miracles: Demon targets suffer +2 power damage and -2 Trait rolls
Runic Insight: +1 casting on spells of 1 chosen runes
Share Spell: Gains benefits of adjacent master's spells
Soul Drain: May suffer Fatigue to recover 5 Power Points
Spell Finesse (Altered Range): Increases range of chosen touch spell to 6" or ranged spell to 12"
Spell Finesse (Arcane): +1 Wild Die step on chosen spell skill
Spell Finesse (Armor Penetration): Chosen spell has AP 2
Spell Finesse (Heavy Weapon): Chosen spell counts as a heavy weapon
Spell Finesse (Range): Chosen spell has an extended range
Spell Finesse (Selective): May exclude 2 creatures from effects of chosen area spell
Wizard: May spend 1 Power Point to change a Power trapping
Wood Warden: Can speak with normal animals/Casts Beast Friend at +2
